After constantly hearing about this game for years and never playing it i thought I'd throw the few dollars towards it and try it out. Well i ended up completing this game in 2 sittings and I LOVED IT. I never really play Puzzle games ever as they aren't my cup of tea but portal is really something different. I loved the story and atmosphere as it looked all clean and nice but secretly behind the doors something else was going on. Really recommend for anyone 9/10
Perdi as contas de quantas vezes zerei isso e quantas vezes eu ouvi a música dos créditos.

Portal, a short but very fun game from beginning to end. It has an excellent tutorial to get you started and a phenomenal climax with great writing and lore. It is surprisingly replayable and very fun to speedrun due to how short it is and how fun the physics are. My only complaints are that floor 15 should of been broken up into multiple floors, and that the game can get quite disorienting when preforming large jumps. All in, Portal is a game that has stood the test of time and even 13 years later is a blast from the beginning to end.
is good
A compact, but enjoyable experience.

Still a classic to this very day. Source games also still look surprisingly good in this day and age even though Portal 2 is an obvious upgrade. If you like puzzles and a short but fun experience just grab the game. I mean come on it's 1 dollar on sale.
